synopsis.text: However in the magical realm of Jewel Land, Lady Jewelina bestows upon Ruby a Magical Jewel Box and a mission to forge friendships and amass Magic Jewels. To fulfill this task, Ruby must attend Jewel Academy and establish the Jewelpet Cafe, which initially struggles to attract patrons. Fortunately, Ruby crosses paths with Chiari Tsukikage, a middle school student, who offers her assistance. Together with Chiari's friends, Nene Konoe and Ruruka Hanayama, they embark on a journey to transform the cafe into a thriving establishment. As they navigate through challenges and triumphs, they must also safeguard the precious Jewel Box from potential thieves.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
